CONFIG_JSON.description: You need to fill out: Host, port, username, password and db_name.

PREFIX.description: The prefix with which you summon RedDiscord-Bot.

REDBOT_INSTANCE.description: Only modify when you specified a different redbot instance name in CONFIG_JSON. Write --no-instance for running redbot instanceless. (Ignores CONFIG_JSON)

OPTIONAL_ARGS.description: Optional arguments for advanced users. E.g. --load-cogs [LOAD_COGS [LOAD_COGS ...]] --owner 1234567890 --mentionable
